Class StartPanelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientCommonBounderies.StartPanelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGUIController, IGUIStartPanel
    public class StartPanelController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGUIController, IGUIStartPanel
    This class is a Controller for StartPanel.fxml AND for LogInFxml
